# delegate

**Instance Property**

The content key session’s delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any AVContentKeySessionDelegate)? { get }
```

## Discussion

Set the session’s delegate using the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVContentKeySession/setDelegate(_:queue:)] method.

## Managing the delegate object

- **setDelegate(_:queue:)**: Sets the session’s delegate object and the dispatch queue on which to call the delegate’s methods.
- **delegateQueue**: The dispatch queue the session uses to invoke delegate callbacks.
